founder.title: The Founder
founder.name: Rama Marie-JosÃ© DIOP
founder.description:
Dynamic, rigorous and results-oriented professional, I stand out for my ability to manage complex projects while ensuring harmonious coordination of multidisciplinary teams. With an excellent sense of organization and great adaptability, I combine technical skills, leadership and strategic vision to achieve set objectives.

With significant experience in managing and supervising technical study projects (buildings, structures, infrastructure), I have developed solid expertise in planning, budget management, execution monitoring and interdisciplinary coordination. My mastery of digital tools and modern project management methods allows me to ensure quality, respect for deadlines and resource optimization.

Curious, committed and passionate about operational excellence, I fully invest in the development of innovative and sustainable solutions in the service of technical and organizational performance.

values.title: Our Values
values.text: Our commitment is based on fundamental values that guide each of our actions: excellence in the quality of our services, constant innovation to meet digital challenges, and transparency in our relationships with our clients
